00023 #include <arch.h>
00024 #include <unistd.h>
00025 #ifdef MICROSOFT
00026 #include <math.h>
00027 #include <direct.h>
00028 void srand48(int s)
00029 {
00030   srand(s);
00031 // cerr<< "srand48 not implemented with Visual "<<endl;
00032 // Process::exit();
00033 }
00034 double drand48()
00035 {
00036   return double(rand())/RAND_MAX;
00037 // cerr<< "drand48 not implemented with Visual "<<endl;Process::exit();return 1.;
00038 }
00039 double atanh(const double& x)
00040 {
00041 // must be x>-1, x<1, if not return Nan (Not a Number)
00042   if(!(x>-1.0 && x<1.0)) return sqrt(-1.0);
00043   return log((1.0+x)/(1.0-x))/2.0;
00044 // cerr<< "atanh not implemented with Visual "<<endl;Process::exit(); return (x);
00045 }
00046 #endif
00047 #include <Process.h>
00048 #include <iostream>
00049 using std::cerr;
00050 using std::endl;
00051 
00052 static char* buf=0;  //new char[801];
00053 // pwd :
00054 // alloue une chaine!
00055 void desalloue_pwd()
00056 {
00057 // si on a alloue le buf on le detruit ...
00058 #if defined(_CSH_) || defined(linux) || defined(cygwin) || defined(MICROSOFT)
00059   if (buf)
00060     delete [] buf;
00061   buf=0;
00062 #endif
00063 }
00064 char * pwd()
00065 {
00066 #if defined(_CSH_) || defined(linux) || defined(cygwin) || defined(MICROSOFT)
00067   if (buf==0)
00068     buf=new char[801];
00069 #endif
00070 #ifdef MICROSOFT
00071   int longueur=800;
00072   _getcwd(buf, longueur);
00073 #else
00074 #if defined(_CSH_) || defined(linux) || defined(cygwin)
00075   int longueur=800;
00076   if (getcwd(buf, longueur)==NULL)
00077     {
00078       cerr << "getcwd returns an error code." << endl;
00079       Process::exit();
00080     };
00081 #else
00082   buf=getenv("PWD");
00083 #endif
00084 #endif
00085   return buf;
00086 }
